tuv.seg: • How to use your Eircode
• Conas do Eircode a úsáid
In July 2015, a new national postcode system known as Eircode was introduced
In Iúil 2015, tugadh córas nua náisiúnta postchóid isteach ar a dtugtar Eircode
All residential and business addresses have been given a unique new Eircode
Tugadh Eircode nua uathúil do gach seoladh cónaithe agus gnó
Residential addresses include every address where post is delivered
Áirítear le seoltaí cónaithe gach seoladh a ndéantar post a seachadadh chuige
Each house on a street, each flat in an apartment block, each unit in a duplex unit and each house in a rural townland has been given an Eircode
Tugadh Eircode do gach teach ar shráid, gach árasán i mbloc árasán, gach aonad in aonad árasán dhá urlár agus gach teach i mbaile fearainn tuaithe
In a halting site with numbered bays, each bay has been given an Eircode
I láithreán stad ina bhfuil bánna uimhrithe, tugadh Eircode do gach bá
The Eircode does not belong to the caravan but to the bay in which it resides
Ní bhaineann an Eircode leis an gcarbhán ach leis an mbá ina bhfuil sé suite
If a caravan or mobile home within a bay moves from the bay, the bay retains the Eircode
Má bhogann carbhán nó teach soghluaiste laistigh de bhá ón mbá, coimeádann an bá an Eircode
If a halting site has an office that receives mail, the office address will get an Eircode
Má tá oifig i láithreán stad a seoltar an post chuige, gheobhaidh seoladh na hoifige sin Eircode
An Eircode is a unique 7-character code consisting of letters and numbers
Cód uathúil seacht gcarachtar é Eircode ina bhfuil litreacha agus uimhreacha
Each Eircode consists of a 3-character routing key to identify the area and a 4-character unique identifier for each address, for example, A65 F4E2
Tá eochair ródaithe 3 charachtar i ngach Eircode chun an ceantar a shainaithint mar aon le aitheantóir uathúil ceithre charachtar do gach seoladh, mar shampla, A65 F4E2
The routing key is the first 3 characters of an Eircode
Is é an eochair ródaithe an chéad trí charachtar de Eircode
The first character is always a letter, followed by 2 numbers (except for D6W)
Litir a bhíonn i gceist leis an gcéad charachtar, agus dhá uimhir ina dhiaidh (seachas i gcás D6W)
The letters are not linked to a county or city name, except for postal districts in Dublin, which have had their existing postal codes transferred into a routing key format such as D03, D12 and D22

Níl na litreacha nasctha le hainm contae nó cathrach, seachas i gcás postcheantar i mBaile Átha Cliath, a ndearnadh a bpostchóid reatha a aistriú isteach i bhformáid Eochair ródaithe, ar nós D03, D12, D15 agus D22
The same routing key can be shared by several towns and townlands
Féadfaidh roinnt bailte agus bailte fearainn an eochair ródaithe chéanna a úsáid
The unique identifier is a group of 4-characters and comes after the routing key
Is é an t-aitheantóir uathúil grúpa de cheithre charachtar agus tagann sé i ndiaidh na heochrach ródaithe
Each unique identifier is different and unique to your home or premises
Tá gach Aitheantóir Uathúil éagsúil agus uathúil i dtaobh do bhaile nó áitribh
They are not in sequence
Ní bhíonn siad i sraith
This is to avoid the situation where a new building is created between two existing ones, and the code sequence would be broken, requiring all Eircodes in the area to be changed
Is amhlaidh atá seo chun an cás a sheachaint ina gcruthaítear foirgneamh nua idir dhá fhoirgneamh reatha, agus go mbrisfí sraith na gcód, agus ina mbeadh gá gach Eircode sa cheantar a athrú
How to use your Eircode
Conas do Eircode a úsáid
The Eircode should be placed at the end of your normal address, just below the County
Ba cheart an Eircode a lua ag deireadh do ghnáthsheolta, díreach faoi bhun an Chontae
If you are writing to a person in Ireland from overseas, the Eircode should go between the County and Country details
Má tá tú ag scríobh chuig duine in Éirinn ó áit thar lear, ba cheart an Eircode a lua idir na sonraí faoin Tír agus an Contae
The use of Eircode is not mandatory
Níl úsáid an Eircode éigeantach
However, it is likely that organisations will ask you for your Eircode, especially those delivering goods or services to your address
Is dóchúil go n-iarrfaidh eagraíochtaí ort, áfach, do Eircode a thabhairt, go háirithe na heagraíochtaí siúd a dhéanann earraí nó seirbhísí a sheachadadh chuig do sheoladh
You should only give your Eircode to people or companies that you would be happy to give your address to
Níor cheart duit do sheoladh a thabhairt ach do dhaoine nó do chuideachtaí a mbeifeá sásta do sheoladh a thabhairt dóibh
There is no personal data on the Eircode database or Eircode Finder
Níl aon sonraí pearsanta ar bhunachar sonraí Eircode nó in Aimsitheoir Eircode
It does include business names, which in some cases can be the name of an individual, particularly for small businesses or sole traders
Áirítear leis ainmneacha gnó, a bhféadfadh ainm duine aonair a bheith i gceist leo, go háirithe i dtaobh gnólachtaí beaga nó trádálaithe aonair
You do not apply for an Eircode
Ní dhéanann tú iarratas ar Eircode
The information shown on the Eircode Finder is based on information received from An Post GeoDirectory
Tá an fhaisnéis a thaispeántar ar Aimsitheoir Eircode bunaithe ar fhaisnéis a fuarthas ó Logeolaire An Post
As An Post update their information and it is passed to Eircode, any changes will be reflected on the Eircode Finder
De réir mar a nuashonraíonn An Post a bhfaisnéis agus go gcuirtear ar aghaidh í chuig Eircode, léireofar aon athruithe in Aimsitheoir Eircode
Each quarter, Eircode will receive an update with any new properties
Gach ráithe, gheobhaidh Eircode nuashonrú ina mbeidh aon réadmhaoin nua
At this time any new address will be assigned an Eircode and an Eircode letter will be sent to the occupier of that address
Ag an tráth seo, sannfar Eircode chuig aon seoladh nua agus seolfar litir Eircode chuig áititheoir an tseolta sin
It is likely that if your address is not listed on the current Eircode Finder that it will be in one of the future versions of the Eircode Finder
Is dóchúil, mura bhfuil do sheoladh liostaithe ar an Aimsitheoir Eircode reatha, go mbeidh sé i gceann de na leaganacha d’Aimsitheoir Eircode amach anseo
Eircode cannot change the postal address information available on the Eircode Finder unless instructed to do so by An Post GeoDirectory
Ní féidir le Eircode an fhaisnéis faoi sheoladh poist atá ar fáil ar Aimsitheoir Eircode a athrú mura n-ordaíonn Logeolaire (GeoDirectory) An Post chun amhlaidh a dhéanamh
If your address in the Eircode Finder is incorrect, it is recommended that you carry on using the address you normally use and simply add the Eircode
Má tá do sheoladh in Aimsitheoir Eircode mícheart, moltar go leanann tú ar aghaidh agus an seoladh a úsáideann tú de ghnáth a úsáid agus gan ach an Eircode a chur leis
You can find or check an Eircode using the Eircode Finder
Féadfaidh tú Eircode a aimsiú nó a sheiceáil agus leas á bhaint as Aimsitheoir Eircode
